attributes.action: Change the law on dog owners and breeders that they must have a dog license
attributes.additional_details: Because this will stop bad dog owners from not training their dogs properly if they are held accountable for the dogs they get. This will also stop dogs being placed into the wrong hands and ensure that dog owners are held accountable for the dogs they own. Ie if the dog isn’t trained they are hit with a fine; if the dog ends up in a rescue or shelter they are to take the dog back and look after it properly or pay and a fine and no longer be allowed to get a license.
attributes.background: Pass a law that any dog in the uk must have a license to have a dog; this includes breeders have to have dog licenses for all their puppies and if the puppies end up homeless the breeders must take them back. You can only breed 2x dog every 6 months and no more.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/643650
Bring back a Dog Licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence
